title: Rama and Ravana (Ramayana — short)
excerpt: Prince Rama rescues Sita after a long exile and defeats Ravana — story of dharma, devotion and triumph.
content: Rama, avatar of Vishnu, follows dharma through exile. Sita is abducted by Ravana. With Hanuman and an army of vanaras, Rama fights a great war at Lanka and defeats Ravana. Vijayadashami (Dussehra) celebrates this victory of good over evil.

title: Durga and Mahishasura (Devi Mahatmya — short)
excerpt: Goddess Durga takes a fierce form and defeats the demon Mahishasura after nine nights of battle.
content: Mahishasura could not be defeated by gods; the combined energy created Durga — who fought for nine days and nights and finally slew the demon. The nine nights are celebrated as Navratri and the victory as Vijayadashami.
